items.summary: Restore the original book cover static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/ by reverting book-cover-01.jpeg, book-cover-02.jpeg, book-cover-03.jpeg, and book-cover-04.jpeg to the versions that existed before Version 25 replaced them. The correct originals are the user-uploaded BOOK (1).jpeg through BOOK (4).jpeg files: book-cover-01.jpeg = गंगा की वाणी, book-cover-02.jpeg = मन के मोती, book-cover-03.jpeg = श्री कृष्ण दर्शन, book-cover-04.jpeg = वृद्धाश्रम. Do not alter the image content — only restore the original uploaded files.
